description: Purchase the Capacity Block extension for use with your account. You must specify the ID of the Capacity Block extension offering you are purchasing.

parameters.name: CapacityBlockExtensionOfferingId
parameters.description: The ID of the Capacity Block extension offering to purchase.

parameters.name: CapacityReservationId
parameters.description: The ID of the Capacity reservation to be extended.

nested_items.name: CapacityReservationId
nested_items.description: The reservation ID of the Capacity Block extension.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type of the Capacity Block extension.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances in the Capacity Block extension.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone of the Capacity Block extension.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZoneId
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone ID of the Capacity Block extension.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionOfferingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Capacity Block extension offering.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionDurationHours
nested_items.description: The duration of the Capacity Block extension in hours.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the Capacity Block extension. A Capacity Block extension can have one of the following statuses:
payment-pending - The Capacity Block extension payment is processing. If your payment can't be processed within 12 hours, the Capacity Block extension is failed.
payment-failed - Payment for the Capacity Block extension request was not successful.

payment-succeeded - Payment for the Capacity Block extension request was successful. You receive an invoice that reflects the one-time upfront payment. In the invoice, you can associate the paid amount with the Capacity Block reservation ID.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionPurchaseDate
nested_items.description: The date when the Capacity Block extension was purchased.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionStartDate
nested_items.description: The start date of the Capacity Block extension.

nested_items.name: CapacityBlockExtensionEndDate
nested_items.description: The end date of the Capacity Block extension.

nested_items.name: UpfrontFee
nested_items.description: The total price to be paid up front.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency of the payment for the Capacity Block extension.
